title: Lower Manhattan
provenance_text:
Maxim Kopf [1892-1958], New York, NY; Andre Seligmann, Inc., New York, NY [1]; Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), November 1943 until April 1, 1973 [1]; his bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. See copies of relevant correspondence between John O'Connor, Jr. and Andre Seligmann in curatorial file.
[2]. The painting was included in Carnegie Institute's 1943 exhibition "Painting in the United States" (no. 76, illustrated, plate 27.) It was purchased by Mr. Rosenbloom from the exhibition for $500 (check dated November 17, 1943.) See also "American Paintings and Sculpture to 1945 in the Carnegie Museum of Art," page 298.
